text: @realDonaldTrump Hey, big coward, afraid of a little covid-19 virus? It's winning and you're showing your cowardice by NOT ever wearing a mask when required to. You're blasting your ignorance for the whole world to see by refusing to protect the people around you by not wearing one. Selfish!!
